-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | WHOIS client library.
--   
@package whois
@version 1.2.2

module Network.Whois
data WhoisServer
WhoisServer :: String -> Int -> String -> WhoisServer
hostname :: WhoisServer -> String
port :: WhoisServer -> Int
query :: WhoisServer -> String

-- | Given an IP address or domain name, attempt to figure out which whois
--   server to use. If we're given a domain name, this is (except in some
--   special cases) usually &lt;tld&gt;.whois-servers.net. If we're given
--   an IP address, we default to a transient server (ARIN), which can give
--   us referral servers to try.
--   
--   <pre>
--   serverFor "192.0.2.123"            -- WhoisServer "whois.arin.net" 43 "n + "
--   </pre>
serverFor :: String -> Maybe WhoisServer

-- | Returns whois information from the top-level and referral servers.
whois :: String -> IO (Maybe String, Maybe String)

-- | Returns whois information from a particular server.
whois1 :: String -> WhoisServer -> IO (Maybe String)
instance Show WhoisServer
instance Eq WhoisServer
